fields.name: ||Notes||
fields.value:
||Stalks the player for 2 minutes, then leaves.
Deals 50 damage and moves sporadically.
Immune to damage and freeze. Vulnerable to Pentagram and Rosary.
Can drop a chest with evolution||

fields.name: ||Spawning||
fields.value:
||Spawns in Dairy Plant and rarely in Green Acres.
Chances are affected by luck
1% at minute 0
30% at 8 minutes
30% at 12 minutes||
